thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Ross Ferguson
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Ross Ferguson

author: Ross Ferguson
title: Ross Ferguson
text:
I am a print broker from Darwin and I have used Easy Signs on a few occasions for Corflute signs.
Each time I have found the staff to give good advice and to be very helpful. There were problems with the file that I supplied for my last job. The pre-press people at Easy Signs alerted me to the problems and advised me on the best way to proceed. I was happy with the final results and, more importantly, my customer was really happy.
One more thing; every job has been delivered on time or early.
I will definitely use Easy Signs for future jobs.
